shortdesc.ph: An audio source for local audio mixing.
Audio source for local audio mixing.

plentry.pd: The type of audio source. See .
The remote user ID. You need to set this parameter when the type of audio source for local audio mixing is AudioSourceRemoteUser.
The audio track ID. Set this parameter to the custom audio track ID returned by the method. You need to set this parameter when the type of audio source for local audio mixing is AudioSourceCustom.
Type of the audio source. See .
Remote user ID. This parameter is required when the audio source type for local audio mixing is AudioSourceRemoteUser.
Audio track ID. Set this to the custom audio track ID returned by the method. This parameter is required when the audio source type for local audio mixing is AudioSourceCustom.
